content.rendered:
Each year, we get a range of new Sony phones released. 2020 brings the new budget addition, the Sony Xperia L4 with top tier features. Getting hold of a lower tier phone doesn’t always mean bad. It just tends to mean that the design is a little less hard wearing or even the previous components were used to build it. With the Xperia L4, you get a lavish design, the best of Sony technology and some great bits under the bonnet.

 

Chic Sony Design

You will get to enjoy a 6.2 inch 21: Wide OLED display with each variant of the L4. A slim design is something you will find on a lot of different Sony smartphones. With each slim design, you’ll be able to comfortably fit the phone into a single hand and operate it with no issues. You’ll be able to enjoy everything you pull on screen in high amounts of details with the 6.2” display as well.

If you’re someone who loves to watch films or videos on your phone, the wide display is perfect for you. View footage as it’s meant to be seen with a completely cinematic feeling. Not only is the wide display perfect for watching videos but, it’s also great for a few of the new features. Multi-tasking will allow you to open up two different apps at once. You can reply to texts whilst watching films or even edit photos whilst on a call. The possibilities are endless with the wide Xperia L4 display.

From the front of the phone, you get a huge sense of style but, this does roll over to the back of the phone too. With a plastic back, you’ll get a clean, matte finish with each colour variant. Both Black and Blue options are available to purchase however, there is no difference other than colour. Express yourself through the Xperia L4 and find your perfect pairing. With such a slick design, you’ll be able to match it with all your outfits too.

 

Meet the Camera Set Up

Sony has never really struggled to create an outstanding, impressive camera capable of producing some high resolution images. Of course, the camera is paired with a range of different features to create a more artistic photo. In the Sony Xperia L4 camera set up, you’ll find a 13MP wide lens, 5MP ultrawide lens and a 2MP depth lens. Each lens plays a part in offering different angles or focal lengths. Each photo this camera produces can be expected to be extremely high quality and show a huge amount of detail and colour.

Any regular photos will be captured with the wide lens. This lens is able to capture high amounts of detail, even in low lighting situations. Never miss the perfect photo opportunity again. If you want to get more of what’s in front of you into a single frame, the ultrawide lens is your best friend. This lens will zoom out and give you more space to shoot. The final lens is the depth lens. With this one, you’re going to be able to make your photos stand out massively. The background will be blurred whilst your subject is fully focused on.

 

A Few Top Features

Whilst all the extra features included in the phone are super important, one of the most important components is the battery. The Xperia L4 was built with a long lasting 3580mAh battery to keep you going for long. You’ll find yourself staying connected to the world for hours longer without having to worry about losing power. Whenever you do find yourself needing a little more power throughout the day, the L4 is actually compatible with fast charging. Pop your phone on to charge whilst you have a coffee and be ready to go about your day.

There is also a super powerful processor keeping this phone going too. Paired with Wi-Fi and 4G, you’ll get super great speeds for uploads and downloads. You’ll even find these speeds reflecting in different apps, games and even videos.

 

Sony Xperia L4 Deals

You’ll find a huge range of Xperia L4 deals available on Fonehouse with some of the best UK networks. Whether you’re looking for high data packages, low price tags or even some amazing extras, we’ve got what you need.

The first network you’ll find the best Sony Xperia L4 deals with is Vodafone. In 2019, they were actually voted the UKs most improved network and have not stopped growing since. One reason customers love them so much is because of their contract add ons. When you join Vodafone, you’ll be able to download the My Vodafone app. Through this app, you’ll find a huge range of discounts and giveaways under the VeryMe tab. These are updated weekly so you can enjoy the hidden value constantly. With the Vodafone Red Entertainment plans, you’ll also get a free 24 month subscription.

If you’re wanting to join the UKs best network, we’ve got the best deals available. With EE, you’ll get the best network speeds and network coverage all over the UK. Not only do you get to enjoy such high levels of service, but you can also make use of the exclusive entertainment service. Throughout your 24 month contract, you’ll get to enjoy 3-6 month long trial subscriptions with some huge brands. These range from BT Sports to MTV Play. You’ll never find yourself lost without a form of entertainment again.

Three is the last network that you’ll find a range of deals on. They have been voted the best network for data is the UK so you know this is where you can get the great data packages. Not only do Three offer high data amounts but they also offer Go Roam and Go Binge for contracts over 12GB. You’ll be able to use your monthly allowance in 71 different destinations as well as enjoy platforms, such as Snapchat, without losing your data.

 

You can check out our unboxing of the Sony Xperia L4 for more information as to what to expect from this budget friendly phone. Once you get to know it, we’re sure you won’t be able to stay away.
